# Data Model

This document outlines the key entities for the Physical AI Backend & Humanoid Robotics Control Server feature.

## Command

*   **Description**: Represents a user's instruction, can be voice or text.
*   **Fields**:
    *   `id`: string (unique identifier)
    *   `type`: enum (voice, text)
    *   `content`: string (the actual command text)
    *   `timestamp`: datetime

## Action Plan

*   **Description**: A sequence of ROS2 actions generated by the VLA model.
*   **Fields**:
    *   `id`: string (unique identifier)
    *   `command_id`: string (FK to Command)
    *   `actions`: list of objects (each object representing a ROS2 action)
        *   `name`: string (ROS2 action name)
        *   `parameters`: object (key-value pairs for action parameters)
    *   `status`: enum (pending, in_progress, completed, failed)
    *   `generated_timestamp`: datetime

## Robot

*   **Description**: Represents the physical or simulated humanoid robot, with attributes like status, sensor data, etc.
*   **Fields**:
    *   `id`: string (unique identifier)
    *   `name`: string
    *   `type`: enum (physical, simulated)
    *   `status`: enum (idle, moving, error)
    *   `current_pose`: object (x, y, z, orientation)
    *   `sensor_data`: object (e.g., camera_feed_url, imu_data)

## Document

*   **Description**: A piece of text from the course content or robot manuals, used by the RAG system.
*   **Fields**:
    *   `id`: string (unique identifier)
    *   `title`: string
    *   `content`: string (full text of the document)
    *   `source_path`: string (path to the original document)
    *   `embedding`: vector (vector representation of the content)
